name: Priscilla's Valentine in Another World
description:
Created for the 2021 Valentine's Day scene contest on RPGMaker Web.

The short story is about our heroine Priscilla who becomes infatuated with Reid after being saved from a group of goblins. Since Priscilla originated from our world, she thought of making Valentine's Day chocolate as a thank-you gift. After several failed attempts she manages to complete a chocolate cake for Reid to enjoy, but it seems like she has some ulterior motives...

Credits:

Software used: RPG Maker MZ by Gotcha Gotcha Games and Degica

Graphics: RPG Maker MZ Runtime Package and MV Trinity DLC pack
Several icons from PixelOdyssey's Icon packs.

Music: (in the order of appearance)
RPG Maker MV - Theme 3
RPG Maker VX Ace - Field 2
RPG Maker VX Ace - Battle 2
RPG Maker XP - Slow 2
RPG Maker XP - Positive 8
RPG Maker 2003 - In the Eternal Flow of Time

Plugins:
HimeWorks - Pre-Title Events for RPG Maker MV (works fine with MZ as well)
VisuStella Core Engine
VisuStella Battle Core
VisuStella Events and Movement Core
VisuStella Message Core
VisuStella Party System
VisuStella Victory Aftermath

Game Font:
Newsreader Variable Font

Special Thanks:
This project is based off VisuStella's Sample Game Project.

Note: I intend to release a downloadable version with the project files (without plugins, though -- you'll have to get those on your own) after the contest ends. That means, expect that on the last week of February. The reason for releasing the project is that people can see how I did the scenes and, hopefully, learn a trick or two on their own.
